summary.span: 提供与 Visual Basic 6.0 之间的兼容性，使您可以使用 Microsoft ActiveX 数据对象 () 创建到数据库的连接。

span.span: Provides compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 , which enabled you to create a connection to a database using Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用此控件以继续使用`ADO`数据连接。Use this control in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to use an `ADO` data connection. 对于新开发，则应考虑使用`ADO.NET`而不是`ADO`。For new development, you should consider using `ADO.NET` instead of `ADO`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[比较的 ADO.NET 和 ADO](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/98f2c0cd-437d-4934-8be5-c174b6782cae)。For more information, see [Comparison of ADO.NET and ADO](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/98f2c0cd-437d-4934-8be5-c174b6782cae). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `BOF`和返回值均由当前的行指针的位置，此指针是否有效。The `BOF` and return values are determined by the location of the current row pointer if this pointer is valid. 如果任一`BOF`或是`true`，则没有当前行和引用的任何尝试数据则会引发异常。If either `BOF` or is `true`, there is no current row, and any attempt to reference data causes an exception. 可以使用`BOF`并属性以确定是否对象中包含行或是否已超出限制的移动行。You can use the `BOF` and properties to determine whether an object contains rows or whether you have gone beyond the limits of an as you move from row to row. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前 在本地内存中缓存的记录数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current .

value.span: 一个 ，指定当前 对象在本地内存中缓存的记录数。

span.span: An that specifies the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current object.

value.span: 默认值为 50 个记录。

span.span: The default is 50 records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CacheSize`值指示提供程序在其缓冲区和多少个记录一次提取到本地内存中保留的记录数。The `CacheSize` value tells the provider how many records to keep in its buffer and how many records to fetch at one time to local memory. 例如，如果设置为 10，打开第一个后，提供程序提取到本地内存前 10 条记录。For example, when set to 10, after opening the first , the provider fetches the first 10 records into local memory. 因此，当您从当前记录向前移动，该提供程序从本地内存缓冲区返回的数据值。Therefore, as you move forward from the current record, the provider returns the data values from the local memory buffer. 只要您跳过最后一条记录，接下来 10 条记录会从数据源提取到缓存。As soon as you move past the last record, the next 10 records are fetched from the data source into the cache. 尽管你可以在游标的生存期内更改值，此更改仅在数据源的下一次提取后影响缓存中的记录数。While you can change value during the life of the cursor, the change only affects the number of records in the cache after the next fetch from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`释放参数设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 当处置参数为`true`，此方法释放此控件引用任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。当您重写，请小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When you override , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). `OnResize`方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The `OnResize` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
